asm.createCustomerSuccessfullyAlert: The customer account has been created and the customer session has started.
asm.saveInactiveCartAlertInfo: The identified cart is an inactive cart. To take further actions on this cart, save it first.
asm.activeCartAlertInfo: The identified cart is an active cart.
asm.startCustomerEmulationAlertInfo: Customer emulation has started. Any actions you do will reflect the effects on the customer account.

searchCustomer.label: Search by name or email address

createCustomerForm.title: Create New Customer
createCustomerForm.createAccountAlert: The customer session starts once you create the customer account.
createCustomerForm.badRequestDuplicatedEmail: Enter a different email address as {{ emailAddress }} already exists.

customerList.title: Elenco clienti
customerList.description: Select a customer from one of several provided lists.
customerList.noCustomers: Al momento, non ci sono clienti in questo elenco dei clienti
customerList.noLists: There are currently no customer lists available. Contact your system administrator.
customerList.listsError: The customer lists could not be retrieved. Please try again later.

dialog.title: Messaggio di avvertimento
dialog.body: Clicking "Switch Customer" will end the emulation for "{{ customerA }}" and start for "{{ customerB }}". Any unsaved changes for "{{ customerA }}" will be lost.

dialog.saveInfo: Save the cart before you can take further actions.
dialog.disableInfo: Cannot save the cart as it is empty.
dialog.title: Salva carrello acquisti

bindCart.assignCartId: Assign a cart id to customer

dialog.title: Assign Anonymous Cart
dialog.body: Do you want to replace the current active cart with the anonymous cart? If you replace the current active cart, it is saved as a saved cart.

asm.csagentTokenExpired: Your customer support agent session is expired.

auth.agentLoggedInError: Cannot login as user when there is an active CS agent session. Please either emulate user or logout CS agent.

error.noCustomerId: No customerId found for selected user. Session cannot be started.
